Name: Dimension Type
Description: This field is used to record the type of measurement that the dimension of the documented object represents.

Name: Dimension Value
Description: This field is used to record the value of the measured dimension of the documented object.

Name: Dimension Unit
Description: This field is used to record the unit of the measured dimension of the documented object.

Name: Dimension Taker
Description: This field is used to record the actor who undertook the measurement producing the dimension of the documented object.
